module.name: models_bands

descr.p: It stores data of one record for/from bands table, with methods to manage it.
It stores data of one record for/from band_history table, with methods to manage it.

element.name: TBirdMark
element.short: Stores data of one bird mark

descr.p: BodyPart indicates the part of the bird body that the mark was used.
Index is the position of the bird mark on the body part.
Color is the color code of the bird mark.
MarkType is the type of bird mark used.
Inscription is the bird mark inscription.
BandId is the key value of the bird mark in the bands table.

module.short: Library of data models for bird bands and related records.
